revision.comment: Il s'agit du carré de la
revision.text: Il s'agit du carré de la corrélation entre deux variables (r2). Il exprime la quantité de dispersion entre les deux variables. r2 is a correlation coefficient which is computed over the frequency of 2 dichotomous variable and is used as a measure of Linkage Disequilibrium and as input data item to the creation of an LD plot Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Jean-Marc Meunier Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra coefficient of determination http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2580747/ http://www.statsoft.fr/concepts-statistiques/glossaire/c/coefficient-determination.html
